Top 10 Best Online Business ideas

Last Updated on: December 10, 2022 by CommonNews

Top 10 Best Online Business ideas, Today’s Date the Internet has become a world that has arrived at piles of floor lives of thousands of people Yes, it really is more than 30% of the people with internet today online business to earn money by doing as much as they probably can never earn even from one job. By the way, if you have a good online business idea, then you can make good use of the millions of people coming to the Internet from your mind. Now like there are many companies like Amazon, flipkart, PayPal, Google AdSense, bit coin, freelancer who have figured out the idea of doing a unique online business, so today they are not millions but crores of billions less, then you also have some unique business idea. You can find so that you can make good use of the traffic of billions of people coming on the Internet. Let us tell you that according to the internet world stats website, the number of people using the internet in the world in 2017 is 3 billion 73 crores, while the number of people using the internet in India is close to 50 crores 21 lakhs. Which is increasing rapidly, then here your question ends whether we can earn money from internet? Because when there are crores of billions of people on the internet, then business also happens among the crowd of people, so there is no doubt that there is a lot of business opportunities on the internet , just your hard work and proper planning should be done.

Before this I go ahead, I would like to tell you about those people who earn crores of rupees from the internet and who have reached the floor from the floor, which will completely eliminate your question whether money can be earned from internet. Is as well as will protrude excitement of passing anything inside you.

Top 10 Successful Entrepreneurs of India Who Earn Money from Internet

Alok Kejriwal is the founder of the Games2Win website, his website is an online gaming website which is counted among the top 20 best online gaming websites in the world, and he earns cores of rupees only from this website.

Anupam Mittal who is the founder of shadi.com website and you must know that shadi.com is such a matrimonial website from where you can choose your life partner.

Dinesh Agarwal is the founder of Indiamart website and this website is an online B2B market place .

You must have bought a lot of things from snapdeal.com and if you have not bought then you must have heard the name and must have seen the add in TV, then you can guess what is the power of internet and where is it from you. Can deliver.

Deep Karla is the founder of the Makemytrip website, which allows you to book tours online and also provides good holiday packages and offers.

Sachin Bansal Binny Bansal
Everyone knows the Flipkart website more, there is no need to say anything about it, and this website is earning billions of money annually from the internet itself.

It is founder of rediff website which is a successful e-commerce website and this website has a turnover of crores in one year.

Ritesh Agarwal
Ritesh Aggarwal, the founder of OYO room website, is only 23 years old and his website allows travelers to book rooms online, if you also want to visit any city, then you can book good and cheap hotel rooms online from this website. can.

Sanjeev Bhikhchandani
Sanjeev Bhikhchandani is the founder of the website naukri.com which helps the unemployed in finding jobs.

vss gem

So friends, these were the 10 websites of India, in which today millions of people in a company reduce thousands to hundreds of people, so in this way they have benefited many people along with themselves from the internet. So you can also do your online business and if you do not have any idea yet and you still want to earn money online. So there is no need to be disappointed because there are also some online business ideas in which you can work alone and earn millions like Oro, so let’s start.

1. Blogging

Blogging is the only easiest and negligible business to start an online business, it is not necessary that you have a lot of technical knowledge, but you must have basic knowledge, in the field of blogging. Many people have tried their hand, some become successful, some are unsuccessful, and some are earning millions. So some thousands, but unsuccessful are those who just want to earn money quickly and do not want to work hard, whereas blogging requires dedication and patience because blogging is not such a thing that website is made overnight and money comes in the morning. If you do hard work, then for 5-7 months you will have to be patient and work continuously without keeping the feeling of money in mind.
Now this question is coming in your mind that how to earn money by blogging, then let me tell you that first of all you have to create a blog/website, you can create it by buying your domain and also on blogger.com for free. Huh. And I think you should start from blogger itself, from this you will get to teach a lot, for more information about the blog, what is our blog, you can read the full informational post.
After creating a blog, you have to write some such articles on your blog, to read which many people come to read your blog, whatever it is, be it information about something, share your past experience, teach someone something. Whatever. But something should happen that thousands of people come to read your blog, then you can apply for Google AdSense and after getting approval, Google will place advertisement on your website and then show the ad and if someone clicks on the ad. If Google gives you money in return for that, then it is simple. The more people who come to your website, the more clicks will be possible and then the more your lack will be, that is, after creating the website, you have to bring traffic to it which is most important for your earning.

2. Affiliate Marketing

Some blogger are who Google AdSense strongly money from Affiliate Marketing to earn it, you have a blog has Judna should be that much traffic will then receive an Affiliate Program and its on its website advertisement figure. If anyone buys that product. So it can get you in as% commission which will decrease as well as your to anyone in Online Business Affiliate Marketing it is given is received milestone that changed the life of people and is not flying their Hunslo For this you should have a blog or website on which 20000 visitors / day can be very good for you.

3. Sell online your E-book

If you are a good writer, you can write well about anything. Then you can also publish your E-book online by writing and you can sell your E-book through Amazon Kindle, Google Books and earn a lot of money.

4. Write quality articles to earn money online

Like I told you above that you can earn money by creating your own blog and writing about what on it, attracting people to read it. So here there are some bloggers who need good quality articles for their blog which they can publish on their blog, so if you have writing skills then you can earn money online by writing articles for bloggers too. In this, you get 500 to 5000 rupees for writing an article, you can also sell the good article you have written on the I writer website .

5. Earn money from YouTube

YouTube is a good way to earn money online, in which you just have to upload the video once and just then will that video keep giving you money for life, even if recently I am on YouTube. Has changed its algorithm because people were earning money by uploading unnecessary videos and earning millions. Due to which the companies were not getting any benefit because the viewer did not have any meaning with the ad, but the new policy of YouTube is harmful for the people doing fake work. But the same people who were making videos with their hard work are already seeing a lot of profit in their YouTube Earning. Seeing snakes, Vagera used to upload videos of Vagera Extra, his earning has gone, he is now getting hardly $1 on 3000 views. So if you can make some such video which is worth watching then now you too can earn good money from YouTube.

6. Earn money as a Freelancer

There are many people who want to get their work done online sitting at home and those who do it also think that they do not have to go anywhere to earn money sitting at home and many people are also doing this, you are doing this on Freelancing Websites like Freelancer.com You can create your account on websites like Fivver, Guru.com, Elance, Upwork. And on these websites, you can earn good online earning by writing content, graphic designing, video making, website design, programming, consultancy, accounting etc. If you start getting good reviews, then after that you will get so much work that you will have to keep another guy with you.

7. Earn Money by Online Teaching

Nowadays many things have changed in digital form, earlier it used to take many days to send letters, now send an email, your message will reach America from India in seconds, similarly online teaching is also there if you are expert in which field. So you can earn good money by teaching online and in online teaching it does not matter where the person is sitting because everyone has a computer in their house, you can teach online while sitting at home.

8. SEO Consultant

I gave my first online business idea blogging because or genuine way to earn money online and everyone wants our blog to come on the first page in search result so that we can get good traffic. So if you know the work of SEO (Search Engine Optimization), you are expert in this field, then of course you can earn a lot of money online from this and this is such a way to earn money online which has immense potential in the coming days.

9. Social Media Consultant

Facebook, Twitter, Instagram You must have been walking and you must have seen many times that the big companies who live there have their own page on social media , so that they are engaged in connecting more and more people to their page. So that their product more than possible promote more if you media social well aware of so you can talk by those companies whose companies social media know on active not stay long either and he did not know the strength of this That social media can give a new flight to their business, so if you do their social media marketing, then they will give you a lot of money in return and you will do this work from your home.

10. Technical Support

You already know how big is the scope of the Internet and millions of websites are always made and deteriorated, so if you come to web designing, programming comes, there is a technical problem in someone’s website and you can fix it, then of course its a lot. More requirement. So you can earn good online money by becoming a technical supporter and solving the problem of their website.
